channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [FLINK-24064] HybridSource recovery from savepoint fails
item.description: Recovery fails because underlying source and split deserializers are not initialized in the restore code path. This requires deferred deserialization of underlying splits after the current source has been set.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
